meanings.definition: A student preparing for the priesthood.
meanings.sent1: The seminarians studied hard to become priests.
meanings.sent2: The seminarians attended classes at the seminary.
meanings.sent3: The seminarians joked about having to wear robes all the time.
meanings.sent4: The seminarians were like seeds growing into future spiritual leaders.
meanings.sent5: The seminarians' dedication to their calling was inspiring.
